metadata.description:
A young woman recovers on a bench without any memory of either her name or what she is doing there. Leading the investigation with great difficulty, she tries to recover her not only her memory, but her whole identity. 
What is she going to discover? A romantic past made of dramas and romances, or the commonplace existence of an ordinary woman? And if so, will she know how to become somebody, having been potentially anybody?
metadata.name: Blank Slate
